column5: Not only was she beat, raped and tortured, over 100 people knew about this shit and did nothing. They were given light sentences and then one of the mothers destroyed her grave because she supposedly ruined his life. And why did they do this? Because she dared to turn one of them down for a date.

They offered you accommodations and you are sticking your nose up at them. They may not be what you want, but it is what has to be. I'm sorry about your son but they have other students to think about too.

Sexual harassment can be verbal, which is very rarely proven unless you film the incident. I had a dude at my job call me "Firecrotch," repeatedly, would tell me how much he wanted to bang me, and how I needed a good "dicking". He did this every day and despite me reporting it, I was accused of a false report. I was told by my managers "He didn't do anything, so it's not sexual harassment." Yeah, fuck that shit. It was and that guy is a deadbeat father to his six kids and the mother of his kids took him to court for raping their 13 year old daughter. He didn't serve one damn day for that and is free now. She had to file a restraining order, which meant nothing, and he beat her face with a bat two weeks later. She had to flee the state and is now afraid to report him again because they didn't lock him up for the crime he already committed. 

On the other side, anyone who makes a false accusation should serve prison time and fines.   


But no, every man is not one accusation away from having their life destroyed. Fucking hell, guys aren't even serving jail time for rape despite having a guilty plea.
And not one person stopped to call the police or even acknowledge the person he hit?

It doesn't matter how good you are. If your shift isn't busy then you won't make anything. 

If the people coming in are assholes, you won't make anything. 

When I waited tables, I had a couple come in and left me nothing. I was known for customer service and I didn't wait tables often. I was trained to cook. Why did they leave me nothing? Because according to the girl, I flirted with her man. 

So no, the majority of the time, it isn't the server's fault.

And they still support the business, so they don't actually give a flying fuck. They are too selfish and cowardly to care about others.

And until then, do everyone a favor and stay home. Better yet, if you plan to go to a sit down place, announce at the very beginning of your meal that you don't intend to tip. If you are set in your conviction, you should have no problem being upfront and honeat about it.

So a little backstory: Josie is a Manx cat. She was not born with a tail but that doesn't seem to stop her. I adopted her from PetSmart, who gets their cats from SPCA. She was returned to SPCA twice with no reason. When I picked her up, she purred and cuddled with me and I knew that she was the perfect cat. I had just lost a 20 year old cat a few months prior and was desperate for another cat to love just like I did the previous one. Josie was the perfect fit. She got me through some hard times. 

Josie's favorite pastimes are cuddling, watching TV, laying on my chest, and sleeping on the top tier of her cat tree.

If you want to see more, I do have an Instagram for her,  Josie_the_Manx. There you will see an abundance of pictures of her, and her dog sister, Violet.
It's our favorite season!
